articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Newly Built Nyongwon Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Newly Built Nyongwon Power Station
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the newly built Nyongwon Power Station.
					 After being briefed about the power station in front of the panoramic map, he acquainted himself in detail with the assembly of equipment and electricity production there, going round an electric generator room and an electric distribution room. 
					
					 Expressing satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the Taean Heavy Machine Complex manufactured advanced generators of high efficiency in a short span of time with their wisdom and enthusiasm and sent them to the power station and that its employees have since kept electricity production going by conducting well equipment and technological management, he highly appreciated their efforts.
					
					 Saying that it is an admirable success that the soldier-builders have built the modern large-scale hydro power station with their own efforts by giving full play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude during the "Arduous March", the forced march, he highly appreciated the shining feats performed by them by providing the eternal wealth for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of posterity and extended thanks to them.
					
					 He noted that the successful completion of the power station is a striking demonstration of the might of the tremendous mental power of the servicepersons of the DPRK who know nothing impossible and the great potentials of the self-supporting national economy and another great victory won by the army and people of the DPRK in their struggle to valiantly shatter the vicious moves of the imperialists and reactionaries to isolate and stifle it and defend and further glorify Korean-style socialism centred on the popular masses.
					
					 Noting that President Kim Il Sung might have been very much pleased if he had seen this shining success today as he personally initiated the building of the Nyongwon Power Station and worked heart and soul for its construction, he remarked with excited tone that the President's behests have been successfully carried out at last thanks to the heroic struggle of servicepersons of the Korean People's Army intensely loyal to the Party and the leader.
					
					 He went on to say that the country would always remember the brilliant exploits performed by the soldier-builders before the country and the people.
					
					 He indicated important tasks which would serve as guidelines in increasing the electricity production of the country. 
					
					 He said that it is difficult to build hydro power stations, but once they are built, they become not only edifices of eternal value but also more beneficial than thermal power stations and atomic power plants in various aspects.
					
					 In order to build more generating capacity, it is necessary to actively find out promising reserve sites for power stations to massively construct hydro power stations, he said, underlining the need to mobilize the whole Party and entire army and all the people to the completion of the construction of the Huichon Power Station in a short span of time at the highest level, in particular. 
					
					 He underscored the need for workers in the field of the power industry to play a vanguard role in building a great prosperous and powerful nation by effecting a leap forward.
					
					  He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, generals of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: KPA General Staff Spokesman Blasts Hostile Forces' Anti-DPRK Racket
articles.content:
KPA General Staff Spokesman Blasts Hostile Forces' Anti-DPRK Racket
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- As already clarified, the Korean People's Army will consider sanctions to be applied against the DPRK under various names over its satellite launch or any pressure to be put upon it through "total participation" in the PSI as a declaration of undisguised confrontation and a declaration of a war against the DPRK.
					 A spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army declared this in an answer given to a question put by KCNA on April 18 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for doing evils over the DPRK's launch of the satellite for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The news that the DPRK scientists and technicians correctly put the satellite Kwangmyongsung-2 into orbit at one go by a multi-stage carrier rocket Unha-2 is being unanimously praised and hailed not only by all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad but by progressive humankind, stirring up the world, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					 It is only the U.S. and Japanese aggressors and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors that are making uproar over the DPRK's successful satellite launch as if a nuclear bomb had been dropped over their own lands and kicking up an unprecedented anti-DPRK racket, raising a hue and cry over the violation of a UN resolution, sanctions and the like.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors is so hateful as to take the lead in such racket in particular.
					
					 It found itself frustrated in the racket it kicked up after dispatching even a destroyer of the puppet navy in a bid to intercept the DPRK's satellite together with interceptor warships of the U.S. and Japanese aggressor forces. This group is unhesitatingly revealing its sinister intention not to rule out even a war, setting in motion even the bellicose elements of the puppet military to cry out for sending a strong and unanimous worldwide message to the DPRK and blustering that a practical pressure would be put upon the DPRK through south Korea's "total participation" in the PSI.
					
					 It is a far-fetched logic of traitor Lee Myung Bak and the bellicose elements of the puppet military that either a satellite launch or a rocket launch is a violation.
					
					 There are not a few countries in the world that launched satellites. 
					
					 But none of them has put a satellite into space by blowing, instead of using a rocket. 
					
					 The group of traitors is ridiculously asserting that the satellite launches by its masters U.S. and Japan do not pose any problem but the one launched by the DPRK where its fellow countrymen live is problematic. This is nothing but vituperation and sophism which can be let loose only by traitors steeped in flunkeyism and submission to the marrows of their bones. 
					
					 The Lee group should have sincerely hailed the admirable event to be proud of in the history of the nation as it demonstrated the dignity and wisdom of the nation to the world. It is, however, working hard to stifle fellow countrymen in collusion with outsiders, the sworn enemies of the Korean nation. This is an unpardonable crime against the nation, reunification and peace. 
					
					 Now that the group officially declared confrontation and war against the DPRK, its revolutionary armed forces will opt for increasing the nation's defence capability including nuclear deterrent in every way, without being bound to the agreement adopted at the six-party talks. 
					
					 The army of the DPRK has never pinned any hope on the six-party talks from their outset but closely followed the moves of the U.S. and Japanese aggressors and the Lee group of traitors.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are always keeping themselves fully ready to go into action any moment to mercilessly punish anyone who encroaches upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK even a bit.
					
					 There is no limit to the strike to be made by the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors should never forget that Seoul is just 50 km away from the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 The persistent anti-DPRK confrontational racket kicked up by the group over the DPRK's satellite launch will only bring disgrace and destruction to it.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Chilean FM
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Chilean FM
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun on April 17 sent a congratulatory message to Mariano Fernandez Amunategui upon his appointment as Foreign Minister of the Republic of Chile.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop from fresh angle, the message wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark Iran's Army Day
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark Iran's Army Day
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Asghar Rezaeipour, military attache of the Iranian embassy here, arranged a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on April 17 on the occasion of the Day of the Iranian Army.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, general officers and officers of the Korean People's Army, and officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 On hand were Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Closes
articles.content:
26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival that opened here on April 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung closed with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Saturday.
					 The festival has contributed to consolidating unity and cooperation among artistes of various countries in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and powerfully promoting the development of human culture and art. 
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kang Nung Su, minister of Culture who is chairman of the organizing committee of the festival, Pak Kwan O, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials concerned and artistes and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 It was also attended by foreign artistes, overseas Korean artistes and diplomatic envoys and embassy officials of various countries and representatives of international organizations here, foreign guests and overseas compatriots. 
					
					 At the prize awarding ceremony held earlier, group prizes went to the Chinese art troupe (Shanghai Symphony Orchestra), the State Academy Ensemble Named after Sveshnikov of Russia, the Cossack State Dance Company of Russia, the art troupe of Koreans in Japan, the art troupe of Koreans in China and the art troupe of Vietnam, merit, individual and ensemble prizes to many artistes, festival participants and items. 
					
					 Kang Nung Su said in his closing address that the festival offered the artistes of different countries a good occasion for deepening friendly feelings, exchanging achievements and experience they gained in the development of national art, closely cooperating with each other in the fields of music, dance and acrobat and expanding and developing cultural exchange. 
					
					 Noting that the participants in the festival highly praised the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and expressed support and solidarity with the Korean people in the struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, he expressed the belief that they would participate in the festival with sincerity in the future, too.
					
					A performance was given at the closing ceremony.

articles.title: Friendly Gathering Held
articles.content:
Friendly Gathering Held
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A friendly gathering of the participants of the 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival was held at the Central Youth Hall on Saturday. 
					 Present there were artistes of different countries of the world and overseas Korean artistes.
					
					 Minister of Culture Kang Nung Su, chairman of the organizing committee of the festival, the vice-chairmen of the organizing committee and officials concerned were on hand. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the gathering. 
					
					 The participants said that the festival held with splendor on the occasion of the Day of the Sun was decorated with remarkable success. They talked about the need to further expand and develop exchange among artistes and deepened friendly feelings, singing and dancing together.

articles.title: Samilpho Specialties Shop
articles.content:
Samilpho Specialties Shop
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Samilpho Specialties Shop opened in Pyongyang recently.
					 It sells foodstuffs and health-food rich in national flavor.
					
					 There are various kinds of honeys, including indigenous-bee-honey, bee-milk-honey, 100-fruits-honey and schizandra chinensis honey, highly efficacious pine-pollen and different kinds of liquors such as Chilbosan agarics wine and yellow serpent liquor, which are good for the improvement of health.
					
					 One can buy various kinds of tonic decoctions and extracts of wild strawberry, serviceberry and schizandra chinensis.
					
					 Popular are the Kaesong Koryo insam tea, barrenwort tea, ginkgo leaf tea, insam-schizandra chinensis tea, kudzu root tea, barley tea and fomes japonicus tea.
					
					 There are seaweed gruel and acorn powder processed by dint of an up-to-date technology, cakes and candy made of fruit of schizandra chinensis, tangleweed and fruit of crataegus pinnatifida and sweet jelly made of insam and nutritive pop cakes, which is good for the improvement of immunity.
					
					 Among the foodstuffs are agricultural products including five kinds of grains, nine kinds of edible herbs, noodles, rice cakes, kimchi, dishes of dried slices of radish or cucumber seasoned with soy-sauce and other side-dishes.
					
					 When customers order, the shop cooks various noodles and rice cakes for them within several minutes.
					
					 The demand for the goods is increasing for their quality.

articles.title: Immortal Banner for Great National Unity
articles.content:
Immortal Banner for Great National Unity
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il made public the famous work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" on April 18, Juche 87 (1998).
					 The work is the library for the national unity which gives scientific answers to the theoretical and practical problems arising in achieving the cause of the national reunification with the efforts of the nation by consummating President Kim Il Sung's Juche-oriented idea, policies and exploits for the great unity of the nation in a comprehensive way and developing them in depth in accordance with the developing reality.
					
					 As clarified in the work, the President's idea on the great unity of the nation is an out-and-out idea of national independence, a noble idea of loving the country and nation and a most broad-minded idea of national unity that he had advanced by applying the Juche idea to the national issue.
					
					 He in the work put forward the five-point policy for the great national unity to be served as a guideline in accomplishing the reunification cause, noting that the President's great idea and feats for the national unity should be adhered to and carried forward.
					
					 ??The five-point policy for great national unity stresses that great national unity must be based on the principle of national independence, the entire nation unite under the banner of patriotism and national reunification, relations between the north and south be improved, the whole nation reject domination and interference of outsiders and fight against the traitors to the nation and the anti-reunification forces, who are in collusion with foreign forces, and all the Koreans in the north, south and abroad visit one another, hold contacts, promote dialogue and bolster up solidarity among them.
					
					 The five-point policy had no sooner be made public than it enjoyed full support and approval of the entire Koreans. It has demonstrated its validity and great vitality to the full.
					
					 Its correctness was proved once again by the historic Pyongyang summit in June Juche 89 (2000) and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration embodying the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The reunification movement, which had forged ahead full of vitality in the June 15 reunification era, met with grave challenge with the south Korean conservative authorities' assumption to power last year.
					
					 The conservative ruling forces of south Korea, going against the fellow-countrymen's unity and reunification aspiration in a vicious way and inciting national confrontation frantically, are negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, declarations for the independent reunification and the great national unity, supported by the entire nation, regarding the fellow-countrymen with hostility and driving  the north-south relations deeper into catastrophic bog in league with foreign forces.
					
					 In particular, they are going to impose a disaster of nuclear war upon the Korean nation by frantically intensifying war provocation moves in collusion with aggressive foreign forces in an attempt to achieve their wild ambition "to invade the north for reunification".
					
					 There are manifold trials and difficulties on the way to the country's reunification but the independent reunification cause of the Korean people will be certainly accomplished as long as they have the great idea and policy of great national unity leading them along the one road of patriotism.

articles.title: Firm Guarantee for Accomplishing Revolutionary Cause of Juche
articles.content:
Firm Guarantee for Accomplishing Revolutionary Cause of Juche
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The most brilliant feat of President Kim Il Sung in providing the eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country is that he laid the firm guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					 The President, with deep penetration into the historical inevitability of the succession to the revolutionary cause, had established the organizational and ideological bases and set the leadership system so as to carry the revolutionary cause of Juche to accomplishment generation after generation and put his heart and soul into the work of having the idea of giving priority to arms carried forward from many years ago.
					
					Already in the 1970s General Secretary Kim Jong Il with the outstanding political ability and noble moral virtues won the boundless respect and absolute trust from the whole Party and all the people for his distinguished services rendered to the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution.
					
					 The entire Party members and people ardently wished to hold him at a leading position of the Party and the revolution, calling him "dear leader". President Kim Il Sung who fathomed the unanimous wish took measures to set up the monolithic system of guidance within the Party and improve and strengthen the party organizational work fundamentally.
					
					 On December 24, Juche 80 (1991) the President, who had paid special attention to establish his leadership system over the army, handed, above all, the heavy responsibility of the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army over to him who had cultivated the grit and commanding art as a brilliant commander in the flames of war and shined his revolutionary activities, thus providing the lasting foundation for the ever-victorious Korean revolution.  
					
					 The President presented "Paektusan" pistol to commanding officers of the KPA on April 25, 1994, earnestly asking them to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the Supreme Commander.
					
					The revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered in Mt. Paektu is being carried forward successfully by Kim Jong Il with unswerving faith to carry the ideology and cause of the President to practice.
					
					 Kim Jong Il had planned the future of the rich and powerful nation and covered the road of field guidance together with the President for many years to develop the DPRK as an invincible powerful socialist country, independent, self-supporting and self-reliant on national defence. Today, too, he is devoting himself to the efforts for translating the intention and idea of the President into practice.
					
					 True to the last teachings of the President, the Korean people will glorify the DPRK as Kim Il Sung's Korea for ever and carry out the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Kingpin of Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Kingpin of Human Rights Abuses
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today carries a signed commentary saying that the U.S. finds itself in a sorry pickle as it is forced to be judged by other country due to the grave human rights abuses committed by high-ranking officials during the Bush administration years.
					 Of late a newspaper of the U.S. reported that Spain set about making inquiries into the truth for criminal prosecution against high-ranking officials of the Bush administration who allowed by law the torture on prison inmates of the U.S. military base in Guantanamo in violation of international laws including the U.N. convention's ban on torture, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Things have come to such a pretty pass that six former high-ranking officials of the U.S. including former Attorney General Gonsales may be summoned to the Spanish court.
					
					 The U.S. is all in a flurry for it. Former Under Secretary of Defense for Policy of the U.S. Feith who is one of suspects malignantly slandered the inquiries to be made by Spain, terming them groundless acts and attempts to threaten the U.S. administration.
					
					 But this tragicomedy is ridiculous enough to provoke laughter of the world people and put shame on the U.S. as it is forced to take off its coat as an "international human rights judge" and show its dirty true colors as a brutal human rights abuser under the eyes of the world.
					
					 The U.S. has been engrossed in finding fault with this or that country turning over leaves of the "book" recording the "human rights issues" in other countries every year and, moreover, it used the records as a means for meddling in the internal affairs of other countries while shelving huge human rights abuses committed by it so far. This is the worst shabby and wicked bad habit peculiar to the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. should certainly be forced to be punished by history sooner or later for its criminal acts infringing upon the sovereignty of other countries under the pretext of the "human rights issue".
					
					 The more human rights abuses the U.S. commits in the world arena, the more the international community will become protesting against them and demanding that the U.S. be taken to international justice.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to fundamentally eliminate the root cause of such crimes, looking back upon its human rights abuses and infringements on the sovereignty of other countries with the shame it is suffering in the international arena as a momentum.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday carries a signed article on the occasion of the 11th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation."
					 In the work Kim Jong Il put forward the five-point policy of the great national unity, which reflects the firm determination and will to achieve the great unity of the entire nation and reunify the country in our generation without fail by preserving and steadfastly carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's outstanding idea of the great national unity and his feats, rich experience and the tradition established by him. 
					
					 The keynote of the above-said five-point policy is that the great unity of the nation should be achieved on the principle of national independence under any circumstances, all Koreans should unite under the banner of patriotism, the banner of the country's reunification, the inter-Korean relations should be improved, they should struggle against foreign forces and the traitors to the nation who are in league with them, develop dialogue and visit each other and strengthen solidarity and alliance. 
					
					 The above-mentioned policy fully reflects Kim Jong Il's steadfast view on the nation and fixed will for independence as he has always led the cause of the country's reunification and the cause of the great national unity in line with the President's idea and will and solved all the problems by relying on the nation's efforts, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 By setting forth the above-said policy Kim Jong Il made it possible for the Koreans to vigorously accelerate the movement for national reunification with an ideological and theoretical weapon for developing the President's cause of the great national unity on a new higher stage and accomplishing it.
					
					 The said policy helped all Koreans desirous of patriotism work hard for reconciliation and unity, converting the movement for national reunification into a nation-wide patriotic movement involving compatriots in the north and the south and abroad and a mass movement embracing people of broad strata irrespective of ideology, political view and party affiliation. 
					
					 Thanks to the struggle of all the compatriots keenly aware of their responsibility and duty as a driving force for the movement for national reunification, there came into being June 15 All-Korean Committee, an umbrella organization for the nationwide movement for national reunification, and organizational solidarity and unity grew strong among Koreans in the north and the south and abroad. 
					
					 All the successes made in the struggle for the great national unity and the country's reunification are a clear proof of the validity and vitality of the five-point policy of the great national unity put forward by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Sycophantic Deeds Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Sycophantic Deeds Censured
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany released a statement on April 10 in denunciation of the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime's sycophancy towards the U.S.
					 The statement pointed out that the Lee Myung Bak "government" is these days blindly joining the U.S. and Japan in the moves to stifle the DPRK, evoking worldwide criticism.
					
					 The U.S. and Japan are hatching every sort of plot to make the Lee group of traitors stand in the van of aggression on the DPRK, it noted, warning that the Lee group would face a stern punishment by the nation for its engagement in sycophancy and treachery.
					
					 If the Lee "government" does not want to face the same doom as the preceding dictators did, it should stop such sycophantic and treacherous deeds at once and come out in the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, and that is the only way for it to atone for its crimes before the nation, the statement said.

articles.title: Anti-U.S. Solidarity Rally Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-U.S. Solidarity Rally Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Confederation of Trade Unions held the 115th anti-U.S. solidarity rally in Seoul on April 14.
					 The speakers at the rally held that the DPRK's satellite launch is not a matter which allows the U.S. and its followers to take issue with by abusing the UN Security Council as it is an exercise of the right of a sovereign state to use outer space for peaceful purposes.
					
					 Looking back on history no country has been to blame for launching a satellite, they said, urging the U.S. not to insist on its far-fetched assertion bereft of impartiality and equilibrium through its groundless misinterpretation. 
					
					 A joint statement issued at the rally accused the UNSC of issuing what it called "presidential statement" in which it took issue with the DPRK's satellite launch with a brigandish logic without knowing even what was launched. 
					
					 The statement noted that the U.S., Japan and others should be held responsible for the consequences to be entailed by the release of the illegal and absolutely unreasonable "presidential statement".
					
					 In the meantime, representatives of the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, the Democratic Labor Party, the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and others called a joint press conference outside the building of the puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade on April 15 at which they demanded a halt to the anti-DPRK campaign of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and went on a sit-in strike.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Compatriots in Japan
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Compatriots in Japan
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Korean organizations and residents in Japan sent congratulatory messages and letters to General Secretary Kim Jong Il in congratulation of his reelection as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 They were the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan, the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Education Association in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, the Standing Council of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Health Workers Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, the Korean Human Rights Federation in Japan and other central and affiliated organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), the Choson Sinbo Company, the Korean News Service, the Hagu Bookshop, the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe, the Tonghae Ltd, the Korean Goods Sales Company, the Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange, the Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan and other business groups, local headquarters of Chongryon, Joson University and Korean schools at all levels in Japan and compatriots in Japan.
					
					 The messages and letters noted that it is great happiness and pleasure of the officials of Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan to have Kim Jong Il at the top post of the state again.
					
					 They expressed the will to trust and follow Kim Jong Il only in any circumstances and brilliantly decorate this year as a year of epochal significance in the drive to usher in the new heyday of the movement of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the General Association of Koreans in China was held at Jilin Yuwen Middle School on April 15 to commemorate the 97th anniversary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Chairman Yang Yong Dong and officials of the association, other Koreans in China, the DPRK consul general in Shenyang and others and officials concerned of China.
					
					 A reporter at the meeting noted that all Koreans are significantly commemorating the 97th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung as the greatest holiday of the nation.
					
					 The President is the eternal leader of the Korean people and the eternal sun of humankind as he personified all personalities and qualifications of a great person on the highest level and performed the enormous feats for the cause of independence of the nation and humankind with his immortal revolutionary idea and through his practical activities, the reporter stressed.
					
					He said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il glorified the 20th century as the century of Kim Il Sung by always guiding to victory the struggle for carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President.
					
					 All Koreans in China should conduct a dynamic drive to achieve the prosperous development of the homeland and accelerate the independent national reunification in step with the people of the homeland who are making grand advance to bring the great heyday of the DPRK true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, the reporter urged.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, there was a photo and book exhibition under the theme of "Comrade Kim Jong Il and Korea today".
					
					 On the same day, an art performance and sports games took place at the gymnasium of the said school to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					
					 In another development, the Liaoning Regional Association under the General Association held a seminar on the greatness of the President and other events on April 13 to commemorate his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Jakarta
articles.content:
Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Jakarta
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Megawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, sent a basket of flowers to the DPRK embassy in Jakarta on April 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Launch Welcomed
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Launch Welcomed
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea in Jordan and the Bulgarian Worker's Party (Communist) made public statements on April 5 and 10 in support of the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 by the DPRK.
					 The Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea in Jordan in its statement charged that the south Korean authorities are viciously slandering the DPRK's satellite launch, kowtowing to the United States. The world's progressive people give high appreciation and full support to this achievement of the DPRK and regard it as their own achievement and victory, it stressed.
					
					 Expressing full support for the DPRK's development of space science and technology, it hoped that the DPRK would go on with its work to conquer outer space.
					
					 The Bulgarian Worker's Party (Communist) in its statement noted that though it is small in territorial size and the number of population, the DPRK has invariably advanced along the road of socialism chosen by itself while squarely standing against the high-handed U.S. and developed the economy with its own efforts and technology and made signal achievements in the field of science and technology.
					
					 Displeased with the DPRK's independent politics and the achievements made under it, the U.S. is resorting to persistent smear propaganda while making provocations against socialist Korea, the statement charged.
					
					 It stressed that the party extends firm solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the heroic Korean people led by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence" was brought out in pamphlet by Enugu Publishing House of Nigeria.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 94 (2005), clarifies that Kimilsungia is a flower of the sun symbolic of the greatness of President Kim Il Sung, who lightened the road ahead of the world people with beam of Juche, and a flower in praise of the great man blooming in the hearts of humankind in the era of independence and that it is high pride and honor of the Korean people to have this flower, a national treasure.
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the work took place at the publishing house on April 9.

articles.title: April Holidays of DPRK Observed
articles.content:
April Holidays of DPRK Observed
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Meetings, photo shows and a joint art performance were held in Kyrgyzstan, Romania, Switzerland, Mexico and Mongolia between April 3 and 13 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 77th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People's United Party "Kyrgyz el" said that the progressive peoples of the world are significantly commemorating the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people and the prominent leader of the international labor movement.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union said that Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK NDC is a meaningful event for the Korean people and the progressive humankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee said that the Day of the Sun is the most auspicious holiday not only of the Korean people but also the world's progressives. And he called Kim Il Sung national hero, distinguished thinker-theoretician, prominent strategist, ever-victorious and iron-willed brilliant commander, benevolent father of the people and great person enjoying deep trust and high praises from the world's progressives.
					
					 The general secretary of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico said that the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for the human cause of independence would remain forever.
					
					 The secretary of state for the Defence Ministry of Mongolia highly praised the immortal feats of Kim Il Sung who conducted energetic activities for the country and the people and the development of the friendly relations between the two countries. And he expressed belief that the army and the people of the DPRK would achieve bigger successes in building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Put on the state of the joint art performance given in Mongolia were such Korean songs as "Where Are You, Dear General?" and "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung".
					
					 Meanwhile, a meeting for commemorating the Day of the Sun took place at Kim Il Sung Economic Special School in Cuba on April 13.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Central Hidroelectrica de Nyongwon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Central Hidroelectrica de Nyongwon
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la nuevamente construida Central Hidroelectrica de Nyongwon.
					  Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la central, recorrio la sala de generadores y la de distribucion electrica averiguando en detalles el estado de montaje de equipos y de produccion electrica.
					
					 Muy satisfecho de que los obreros del Complejo de Maquinaria Pesada de Taean enviaron a esta central los generadores avanzados de alta eficiencia, producidos en un corto tiempo dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion, y de que los empleados de la central normalizan la produccion electrica realizando bien la administracion de equipos y la gestion tecnica, reconocio los esfuerzos de ellos.
					
					 Calificando de exito admirable el hecho de que en el periodo de la "Marcha penosa" y la forzada, los constructores militares edificaron por cuenta propia esta moderna central hidroelectrica de gran tamano manifestando en alto grado el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y lucha tenaz, aprecio altamente la brillante proeza de ellos que prepararon otra riqueza eterna para la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad de todas las generaciones venideras y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					 La exitosa culminacion de la obra de esta central deviene la orgullosa demostracion de la ilimitada potencia espiritual de nuestro ejercito, que no sabe lo imposible, y de la colosal potencialidad de la economia nacional independiente, asevero.
					
					 Igualmente, significa otra gran victoria alcanzada por nuestro ejercito y pueblo en la lucha por defender y glorificar el socialismo al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares frustrando con audacia las brutales maniobras de los imperialistas y otros reaccionarios para aislarnos y atropellarnos, enfatizo.
					
					   Cuan se habria alegrado el Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien tomo la iniciativa de construir esta central y realizo ingentes esfuerzos fisicos y espirituales por llevarla a efecto, si el hubiera visto esta orgullosa realidad de hoy, dijo el Dirigente y anadio con mucha emocion que por fin quedo materializado satisfactoriamente el legado del Presidente gracias a la lucha heroica de los uniformados del EPC, infinitamente fieles al partido y al lider.
					
					Asevero que la patria nunca olvidara los brillantes meritos realizados por los constructores militares por la patria y el pueblo.
					
					A continuacion, indico las tareas programaticas que servirian de guia en el aumento de la produccion electrica del pais.
					
					Aunque es dificil construir una planta hidroelectrica, una vez construida, ella sera una creacion de eterna duracion y es mas ventajosa en varios sentidos que la planta termoelectrica o la central nuclear, destaco.
					
					Para incrementar la capacidad de generacion electrica, es preciso buscar activamente los terrenos prometedores para esta labor y construir en ellos muchas centrales hidroelectricas, senalo.
					
					En particular, hay que terminar en un corto plazo y al maximo nivel la construccion de la central de Huichon movilizando a todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo, apunto.
					
					El sector de la industria electrica debe cumplir el papel de vanguardia en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera al registrar un gran auge, concluyo.
					
					Acompanaron al Dirigente en esta ocasion el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek y Pak Nam Gi, y los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Cualquier sancion o presion provocara reaccion justa de RPDC
articles.content:
Cualquier sancion o presion provocara reaccion justa de RPDC
 Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ATCC) -- Como ya hemos aclarado, las medidas de sancion de diferentes rotulos, que se tomen pretextando el lanzamiento de satelite artificial por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, o cualquier presion pretendida a traves de la "participacion total" en la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion" (PSI en ingles) y otras cosas devienen precisamente la abierta declaracion de confrontacion y guerra contra la RPDC.
					  Asi destaco el portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea en una entrevista concedida este sabado con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea con motivo de que ultimamente, la camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak se porta de mal en peor en cuanto al lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos por parte de la RPDC.
					
					 Nuestros cientificos y tecnicos pusieron exactamente de una vez en la orbita planeada el satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong no. 2" lanzado a bordo del cohete transportador de varios cuerpos "Unha-2", comenzo el portavoz y prosiguio:
					
					 Esta noticia conmueve no solo a los compatriotas del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar sino tambien a la humanidad progresista que elogia unanimemente y envidia ese suceso.
					
					 Sin embargo, unicamente, los agresores norteamericanos y japoneses y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak escandalizan el exitoso lanzamiento de satelite artificial por nuestra parte como si hubiera caido una bomba nuclear en el patio de su casa y libran una campana anti-RPDC sin precedente hablando de la violacion de la resolucion de la ONU y de la sancion, etc.
					
					 Al frente de esta campana esta la abominable camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak, que se fue en vacio de sus ajetreados movimientos como el envio de un destructor de las fuerzas maritimas titeres para que interceptara nuestro satelite junto con los buques interceptores de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y japonesas.
					
					 En estos dias, esa horda expone abiertamente, por conducto de los elementos belicistas del circulo militar titere, su siniestra intencion de desatar hasta la guerra diciendo que se debe enviar a la RPDC "un fuerte y unanime mensaje mundial" y ejerceran la presion practica mediante la "participacion total" en la PSI.
					
					 Partiendo de su logica estupida, el traidor Lee Myung Bak y los belicistas del ejercito titere insisten en que suponen una violacion tanto el lanzamiento de satelite artificial como el de cohete.
					
					 En este mundo no son pocos los paises que han lanzado el satelite artificial.
					
					 Por supuesto, ninguno de ellos lo habra hecho a soplos sin utilizar un cohete.
					
					 La insistencia absurda de la banda del traidor Lee en que no son problematicos los satelites artificiales que lanzan sus amos norteamericano y japones,  pero si lo son cuando fueran lanzados por nuestro pais, es un rumor manoso de ese colectivo enviciado de servilismo y sumision a grandes potencias y su disparate de caracter vendepatria y chovinista nacional.
					
					 No se puede perdonar de ninguna manera el crimen antinacional, anti-reunificacion y antipaz de esa horda que se mueve desesperadamente para atropellar a los connacionales cooperando con las fuerzas extranjeras y hasta con los enemigos jurados, lejos de aplaudir sinceramente ese acontecimiento digno de registrarse en la historia nacional, que mostro a todo el mundo la dignidad y la inteligencia de la nacion.
					
					 Dado que fueron declaradas oficialmente la confrontacion y la guerra contra la RPDC, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias optaran por fortalecer por todos los medios el poderio defensivo del pais, inclusive el disuasivo nuclear, sin comprometerse al acuerdo de las conversaciones a 6 bandas.
					
					 Desde el principio, el EPC no cifro ninguna esperanza en esas negociaciones sino vino vigilando agudamente los movimientos de los agresores norteamericanos y japoneses y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 Al igual que en el pasado, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias se mantienen todo el tiempo en la disposicion de movilizacion para castigar implacablemente a cualquiera que atente, aunque en lo mas minimo, nuestra soberania y dignidad, persiguiendolo hasta el ultimo rincon de este mundo.
					
					 Es ilimitado el ataque de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					 La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak no debe olvidar nunca que Seul esta apenas a 50 kilometros mas o menos desde la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					
					 Si ella recrudece la campana de confrontacion con la RPDC acusandola de continuo de lanzamiento de satelite artificial, sufrira la verguenza y la ruina mas amargas.

articles.title: EE.UU. es peor violador de DDHH, afirma Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. es peor violador de DDHH, afirma Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual divulgado este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela la miserable situacion de los ex altos funcionarios de la administracion Bush que deben someterse al veredicto de los tribunales extranjeros por sus graves crimenes contra los derechos humanos.
					  Segun el reciente reporte de un periodico norteamericano, Espana inicio la investigacion para someter al pleito penal a los ex funcionarios de alto rango de la administracion Bush, quienes autorizaron legalmente la tortura a los encarcelados en la base militar norteamericana en Guantanamo violando la Convencion de la ONU contra la Tortura y otras leyes internacionales, senala el comentarista y continua:
					
					  Por consiguiente, es probable que el ex fiscal general Gonsales y otros 5 funcionarios de EE.UU. comparezcan al tribunal de Espana.
					
					  Perplejos por el respecto, el ex secretario adjunto de Defensa para la politica Feith censuro con sana la investigacion de Espana calificandola de absurda e intento de chantajear a la administracion norteamericana.
					
					  Pero, este caso tragicomico es suficiente para volver a desnudar, a la vista del mundo, a EE.UU., que cinicamente esta vestido de "juez internacional de DDHH", y mostrar su asquerosa fachada de peor violador de DDHH.
					
					  Lo peor de los vicios de este imperio es que cuestiona todos los anos la "situacion de DDHH" de otros paises y utiliza este tema como medio de intervencion en los asuntos internos de estos encubriendo sus enormes crimenes cometidos hasta la fecha contra los DDHH.
					
					  El acto criminal de EE.UU. de atentar la soberania estatal de otros paises bajo el pretexto del problema de DDHH sera tambien juzgado sin falta por la historia.
					
					  Cuanto mas crimenes anti-DDHH cometa EE.UU. en la escena mundial, tanto mas fuertes seran las protestas de la sociedad internacional que quiere someterlo al juicio internacional.
					
					  EE.UU. debe sacar lecciones de la verguenza que esta pasando ahora en la arena internacional y reflexionar de sus crimenes contra los DDHH y la soberania de otros Estados para erradicarlos de raices.

articles.title: Clausurado XXVI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera
articles.content:
Clausurado XXVI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ATCC) -- Quedo clausurado el dia 18 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang el XXVI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera, inaugurado el dia 10 con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Este festival contribuyo al fortalecimiento de la unidad y la cooperacion entre los artistas de varios paises del mundo bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y al impulso dinamico del desarrollo cultural y artistico de la humanidad.
					
					   En ese acto participaron Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ro Tu Chol, vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, Kang Nung Su, ministro de Cultura y presidente del Comite Organizador del Festival, Pak Kwan O, presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, y otros funcionarios, los artistas y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					   Tambien, estuvieron presentes los artistas extranjeros, los artistas coreanos residentes en ultramar, los representantes diplomaticos y otros miembros de las embajadas de varios paises en Corea, representantes de las organizaciones internacionales, huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas en ultramar.
					
					Con anterioridad, fueron otorgados el premio colectivo a la Orquesta Sinfonica de Shanghai de China, el Coro Academico Nacional Sveshnikov de Rusia, el conjunto de baile de Cossack de Rusia, los grupos artisticos de coreanos residentes en Japon y en China y el conjunto artistico de Vietnam; el premio de meritos, el premio individual y el de armonia a muchos artistas, participantes en el festival y obras.
					
					Al pronunciar la palabra de clausura, Kang Nung Su dijo que mediante el presente festival, los artistas de varios paises profundizaron la amistad, intercambiaron los exitos y experiencias obtenidos en el desarrollo del arte nacional y prepararon una buena ocasion para cooperar mutua y estrechamente en los dominios de la musica, la danza y la acrobacia y desarrollar el intercambio cultural.
					
					Destaco que los participantes elogiaron la noble personalidad del Presidente Kim Il Sung y expresaron el apoyo y solidaridad al pueblo coreano que lucha por construir una gran potencia prospera y alcanzar la reunificacion de la patria bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Estoy seguro que los participantes seguiran participando con sinceridad en el festival primaveral por el Dia del Sol, concluyo.
					
					A continuacion, se ofrecio la funcion de clausura.
